channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 CFP Title Odds: Ohio State Favored; Alabama Makes a Leap
item.description: See the latest CFP title odds, now that the first round of the College Football Playoff has begun.

item.title: Devin Askew finds Duke Brennan for pick-and-roll slam, sealing Villanova's win over Wisconsin
item.description: Devin Askew connected with Duke Brennan for the pick-and-roll slam, sealing Villanova's win over Wisconsin

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Alabama's Comeback, Oklahoma's Collapse in CFP First-Round Game
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young breaks down his key takeaways from the Alabama's stunning comeback victory vs. Oklahoma.

item.title: Wisconsin's Nolan Winter finishes put back, sending game to OT against Villanova
item.description: Wisconsin's Nolan Winter finished put back to send the game to OT against Villanova.

item.title: 2025 CFP Odds: Lines, Spreads for Each Opening Game
item.description: Check out the odds for the three remaining College Football Playoff first-round games.

item.title: Down 17-0, Tide 'keep fighting' to stun Sooners
item.description: No. 9 seed Alabama rallied to beat No. 8 Oklahoma 34-24 in the College Football Playoff first round Friday.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona eye Man City defender Gvardiol
item.description: Manchester City defender Josko Gvardiol is a target for Barcelona. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Sources: Rockets expand talks to buy, move Sun
item.description: Rockets ownership is in substantive talks with the Connecticut Sun over the potential purchase and relocation of the WNBA franchise to Houston, source...

item.title: Joshua bides time, batters Paul in sixth-round KO
item.description: It took longer than many predicted, but Anthony Joshua finally hunted down Jake Paul, dropping him four times in a sixth-round knockout victory Friday...
